<h3 id="X11499">X(11499)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE AND JOHNSON</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-(b+c)*a^5-2*(b^2+c^2)*a^4+2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b^4+c^4-2*b*c*(b^2+b*c+c^2))*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2*b*c  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11499) = (R+r)*X(3)-2*R*X(10) = R*X(4)+(R-2*r)*X(100)</b>
<p>X(11499) lies on these lines:{1,6911}, {2,10267}, {3,10}, {4,100}, {5,55}, {8,6905}, {11,6959}, {12,6917}, {21,5818}, {30,10310}, {35,3560}, {36,5881}, {40,5692}, {42,5707}, {43,3072}, {46,912}, {56,952}, {57,5534}, {71,5778}, {78,517}, {104,4188}, {109,8757}, {140,4413}, {149,6979}, {165,7330}, {200,5709}, {209,6237}, {227,1060}, {377,10786}, {381,4421}, {388,6885}, {390,6964}, {404,944}, {405,9956}, {411,5657}, {474,1385}, {480,5762}, {484,5693}, {497,6944}, {499,10943}, {519,10680}, {528,7681}, {549,8273}, {602,899}, {692,10539}, {943,6843}, {946,8715}, {1001,1656}, {1006,9780}, {1259,10526}, {1260,5812}, {1329,5842}, {1478,10942}, {1482,2802}, {1483,3304}, {1486,7529}, {1490,3359}, {1532,10525}, {1621,3090}, {1698,6883}, {1771,3157}, {1837,8069}, {2077,5691}, {2550,6825}, {2551,6868}, {2886,6863}, {2975,6942}, {3035,6958}, {3073,3550}, {3085,6826}, {3086,6970}, {3198,8251}, {3256,9612}, {3295,5886}, {3303,5901}, {3336,5531}, {3428,5690}, {3434,6834}, {3525,9342}, {3579,5777}, {3616,6946}, {3628,4423}, {3652,5779}, {3679,11012}, {3746,8227}, {3833,10246}, {3871,5603}, {3874,9946}, {4294,6893}, {4428,5055}, {5067,5284}, {5070,8167}, {5082,6927}, {5217,6914}, {5218,6824}, {5225,6973}, {5248,10175}, {5252,8071}, {5253,7967}, {5260,6875}, {5281,6846}, {5396,5711}, {5432,6862}, {5535,5904}, {5731,6940}, {5805,6600}, {5810,7085}, {5811,9778}, {5817,7676}, {6214,11498}, {6215,11497}, {6284,6929}, {6585,6734}, {6690,6861}, {6713,6921}, {6745,10306}, {6867,10588}, {6880,10527}, {6881,10198}, {6953,10531}, {6981,10591}, {6984,10585}, {7171,10270}, {7688,9588}, {8200,11492}, {8207,11493}, {8220,11503}, {8221,11504}, {8580,10268}, {9996,11494}, {10087,10965}, {10528,10532}, {10597,11239}, {10738,10893}, {10796,11490}</p>
<p>
X(11499) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3149,5687}, {3436,6934}<br>
X(11499) =
reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (56,6924), (1479,5), (6928,1329)<br>
X(11499) = homothetic center of tangential triangle and reflection of intangents triangle in X(5)<br>
X(11499) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2,11491,10267), (3,5790,958), (4,100,11248), (10,6796,3), (35,5587,3560), (40,5720,5887), (100,5552,11517), (404,944,10269), (946,8715,10679), (1376,11500,3), (1698,10902,6883), (1771,4551,3157), (3295,6918,5886), (11501,11502,1)<br>
